title: client freezing
body: hey guys, during champion select my client goes into a freeze mode after i change a spell. once i change the spell the client goes darker and won't allow me to click on anything else but the count down continues. wondering if this is a client or a computer problem. was also wondering if anyone else had the same problem

replies.body:
Hey there,

This issue has been acknowledged by Riot and they're working on a fix, see [this](http://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/help-support-oce/hprhLF4v-61-champion-select-bug-unable-to-select-champion-after-changing-summoner-spells) thread for more information and how YOU can help speed up the fix.
